body_html:
Yeah @carpodaster depending on how up to date the dependencies are, an update to 2.4 would also mean updating them all 😉 - everything else would end in warnings-hell.

I gave bundle update json and using 2.3.3 a quick try and this looks good.
body_text:
Yeah @carpodaster depending on how up to date the dependencies are, an update to 2.4 would also mean updating them all 😉  - everything else would end in warnings-hell.
I gave bundle update json and using 2.3.3 a quick try and this looks good.
body:
Yeah @carpodaster depending on how up to date the dependencies are, an update to 2.4 would also mean updating **them all** 😉  - everything else would end in warnings-hell.

I gave `bundle update json` and using `2.3.3` a quick try and this looks good.
